mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(tl.tNum) as tagCount, tw.tagNum, tw.tagName FROM tagWord tw LEFT JOIN tagLog tl ON tw.tagNum = tl.tagNum GROUP BY tw.tagNum

SELECT l.tNum, l.tTitle, u.userNick, date_format(l.writeDate, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i")writeDate FROM travelLog l JOIN user u ON l.userNum = u.userNum ORDER BY tNum DESC LIMIT ${param1.postsPerPage} OFFSET ${param1.offset}

SELECT b.boardNum, b.boardContent, u.userNick, date_format(b.writedate, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i")writedate FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.userNum = u.userNum ORDER BY boardNum DESC LIMIT ${param1.postsPerPage} OFFSET ${param1.offset}

SELECT u.userNum, u.userNick, u.registerDate, IFNULL(tl.tNumCount,0) AS tNumCount, IFNULL(b.bCount,0) AS bCount, IFNULL(tNumCount,0) + IFNULL(bCount,0) AS sum, IFNULL(r.rCount,0) AS rCount FROM user u LEFT JOIN (SELECT userNum, count(tNum) AS tNumCount FROM travelLog GROUP BY userNum) tl ON u.userNum = tl.userNum LEFT JOIN (SELECT userNum, count(boardNum) AS bCount FROM board GROUP BY userNum) b ON u.userNum = b.userNum LEFT JOIN (SELECT userNum, count(reportNum) AS rCount FROM report GROUP BY userNum) r ON u.userNum = r.userNum ORDER BY u.userNum DESC LIMIT ${param1.postsPerPage} OFFSET ${param1.offset}
